nodes.text: Joi was a Human female who lived on the planet Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War.
In 1 ABY, Joi resided in the city of Bestine on Tatooine. While here, she received a crate of a illicit goods from a smuggler working for Gotan.

Joi is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game, people who play as a smuggler may work for a person named Gotan, and deliver smuggled goods to various individuals, including Joi.
